functions.tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"Barrett M82","color":"dark_red","bold":true}',Lore:['{"text":"バレット・ファイアーアームズ社が開発した大型狙撃銃。","color":"white","bold":true,"italic":false}','{"text":"どういった経緯でGameMasterが手に入れたかは不明だが、","color":"white","bold":true,"italic":false}','{"text":"軽戦車にも通用するこの銃を容易に扱ってはいけない事は明らかである。","color":"white","bold":true,"italic":false}']},Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:power",lvl:50s},{id:"minecraft:punch",lvl:10s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.movement_speed",Amount:-0.9,Operation:2,UUID:[I;0,1,0,-1],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Amount:15,Operation:0,UUID:[I;0,1,0,1],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Amount:1,Operation:0,UUID:[I;0,1,0,2],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Amount:15,Operation:0,UUID:[I;0,1,0,3],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
